accommodation.description: Accommodation for guests will be arranged for 20th and 21st night

food.description: All meals during the wedding days (20th-22nd Feb) will be provided for guests

events.name: Sangeet
events.description: Musical night with dance and celebrations
events.note: Feel free to prepare performances! Let us know if you'd like to perform.

groomFamily.note: Rahul + Family will be flying from Delhi on 19th. People are welcome to join them!

outfits.description: Dress code and outfit details coming soon!

postWeddingTrip.description: We're planning a trip right after the wedding! More details will be shared soon. Stay tuned!

faq.question: Will food be provided?
faq.answer: Yes! All meals during the wedding days (20th-22nd Feb) will be provided for all guests.

faq.question: Is accommodation provided?
faq.answer: Yes, accommodation will be arranged for all guests for the nights of 20th and 21st February.

faq.question: What should I wear to the Haldi ceremony?
faq.answer: Yellow clothes are recommended for the Haldi ceremony as it's a traditional turmeric ceremony.

faq.question: Can I perform at the Sangeet?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We'd love to see performances from our friends and family. Please let us know if you'd like to perform so we can coordinate.

faq.question: Are you planning any trips after the wedding?
faq.answer: Yes! We're organizing a post-wedding trip. Details are not final yet, but we'll share information soon.

faq.question: How do I get to the venue?
faq.answer: Jenvi Conventions is located in Hyderabad. Detailed directions and transportation information will be shared with you directly.

whatsappGroup.description: Join our WhatsApp group to connect with other guests and plan trips together!
